name: Celestial harmony (Stray Beast, catchthecat, godbiotix)
description:
This game is a strategy about building a galaxy. The problem is, entities that form it are fundamentally different.

Red suns, blazing with anger, and cold, indifferent stars, calm green giants and fast asteroids, planets and black holes, matter and antimatter.

The galaxy is burning down with aggression, freezes and shatters into pieces with cold indifference or cancels itself and turns into nothing. Maintaining balance is extremely hard. But it is the only way this galaxy can exist.

Project was made by:
Game gesigner, programmer — greirat, telegram @StrayBeast, discord Greirat#5972
Artist, animator — godbiotics, discord godbiotics#4849, twitter @godbiotics
Sound designer — catchthecat!, discord hc#4296
